subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Three World Cup events originally scheduled for Val d’Isère in France on Dec. 10 and 11 will be held at Beaver Creek, Colo., next week because of a lack of snow.
snippet: Three World Cup events originally scheduled for Val d’Isère in France on Dec. 10 and 11 will be held at Beaver Creek, Colo., next week because of a lack of snow.
